pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Rcpp' Bindings for 'Redis' using the 'hiredis' Library // Connection to the 'Redis' key/value store using the C-language client library 'hiredis'. 'MsgPack' encoding is optional if the 'RcppMsgPack' package is detected. You can install via from the 'ghrr' drat repository listed below.
